input_args.text: "The Empire Files: Inside Palestine's Refugee Camps The Empire Files: Inside Palestine's Refugee Camps By 0 59 \nIn her first on-the-ground report from Palestine, Abby Martin gives a first-hand look into two of the most attacked refugee camps in the West Bank: Balata and Aida camps. \nWith millions of displaced Palestinians around the world, hundreds of thousands are refugees in their own country — many have lived packed into these refugee camps after being ethnically cleansed from their villages just miles away."
